law.history: Repealed 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 308, sec. 28, effective July 14, 2000; amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 10, effective July 14, 2000; and ch. 204, sec. 1, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 112, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 362, sec. 6, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. I, sec. 15, effective July 13, 1990; and ch. 518, sec. 2, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 33, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1988. -- Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 397, sec. 5, effective July 13, 1984.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Development of statewide Early Childhood Education Program -- Kentucky Early Childhood Advisory Council.
metadata.lrc-note: (7/14/2000). Under KRS 446.260, the repeal of this section in 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 308 prevails over its amendment in 2000 Ky. Acts chs. 14 and 204.
